chinese: So, 粤语常用语手册(Cantonese phrasebook)派上用场了.
english: So, the Cantonese phrasebook came in handy.

chinese: 一年中的这个时候那里天气怎么样?
english: So what was the weather like this time of year?

chinese: 我希望Hong Kong的天气比这里的好.
english: Hong Kong was better than here, I hope.

chinese: Why?这里下雨了吗?
english: Why? Did it rain?

chinese: 老下雨, 天气很糟糕.
english: Wet and miserable.

chinese: 太糟糕了. Hong Kong很热.
english: Too bad. Hong Kong was hot.

chinese: 我很喜欢. 有些日子气温会达到华氏85度.
english: I loved it. Some days it reached 85'.

chinese: Whew! 那对我来说太热了.
english: Whew! Too hot for me.

chinese: 不是热的问题. 是潮湿.
english: It's not the heat. It's the humidity.

chinese: 又热又潮? Yuck.
english: Hot and humidy? Yuck.

chinese: Oh, 不过到处都有空调.
english: Oh, everything's air-conditioned, anyway.

chinese: 有一天,我乘船去Macau.
english: One day, I went by boat to Macau,

chinese: 在海上遇到了超级大的暴风雨.
english: and there was a fantastic thunderstorm on the water.

chinese: Macau在哪儿?
english: Where's Macau?

chinese: George, 看来我们得给你弄张地图来.
english: George, we have to get you a map.

chinese: Ah, 它在Hong Kong的东面.
english: Ah, it's just east of Hong Kong.

chinese: -在西面. -Hm?
english: -West.  -Hm?

chinese: Macau在Hong Kong的西面.
english: Macau is west of Hong Kong.

chinese: 对. 我的地图是反的.
english: That's right. My map was backwards.

chinese: Well, 毕竟它在世界的另一边.
english: Well, it is on the other side of the world.
